root.str: A facility with an adjacent yellow link represents a battle front. These facilities are vulnerable to capture.
Passively increases the ANT's total Cortium Storage by 2000.
The NC Patriot Flare Gun fires a variety of blue flares. NC use only
Are you sure you want to remove the current single-use camo and expend this single-use camo?

This is an Engineer training mission, soldier. With the Engineer class, equip your Nano-Armor Kit and repair vehicles and deployables, like turrets. Use your ability to drop Ammunition Packages to resupply teammates and keep them in the fight longer. As an Engineer, you're best suited to set up defenses and sustain the fight. Stick together and you'll be successful.
The Heavy Assault class is equipped with a rocket launcher for destroying enemy vehicles.Change classes to Heavy Assault.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Unlock all of the Green Wisp Tire Trails in this low-price bundle. All factions receive these items.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 14 minutes.
Mission: Message Courier: Progress has been reset due to logging out or changing continents mid-mission.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 7 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
MAX are heavy infantry in vehicle-class power armor with modular weapon systems that can be configured to handle infantry, vehicles, and aircraft.
Apply the single use Sandy Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Liberator by 5%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.

The dumbfire-capable T2 Striker houses a six-round magazine of compact, heat-seeking rockets that will home in when within proximity of enemy aircraft. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Proximity Seeking: Aircraft</font>
VS Bombs go BOOM when they hit their target.
Unlock Certifications for the Light Assault's aerial combat tools. Tools can be equipped on the loadout screen.

Displays health of damaged, spotted enemies; also increases the range that the reticule can identify enemies.
DEV NOTE: Should eventually function in a vehicle, too.
A built-in select fire mode gives users of the Solstice SF the ability to adapt to nearly any scenario. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rockets.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> I'm sending you a list of locations that need to be investigated, sooner rather than later.
Terminal is not powered by a Silo

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> As a representative of Nanite Systems, I would never ask you to retrieve this information illegally. And I certainly would not put you into contact with someone like FL-34, who may be able to procure this information.
Spotted enemy near the control node.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Copper Medal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Reduces damage taken upon being revived.
Liberty Arsenal's hefty LA2 Rampart is their take on the basic Jackhammer design. Re-envisioned to be better suited for point defense, the Rampart can lock down high priority locations with ease.

On May 20th, we begin to celebrate the legacy started in 2003 with the original PlanetSide.

+ Welcome the new NS Scorpion, an air-burst rocket launcher that calls back to the original PlanetSide.
+ Find limited time items in the Depot for the duration of the event.
+ Looks like your old pal FL-34 in Sanctuary is throwing out some defective equipment, as well.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 shots.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. VS use only.
The Ballistic Rapid Refire Toggle overclocks the Mini-Chaingun's motor drive, allowing it to spool up 50% faster.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 6 second cooldown between uses.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by 40%

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Plants discovered after the warpgate exploded are studied here in the Botany Wing. The "space carrots" grow faster when they're closer to the tempest energy they siphon here.

Capture and hold these points to take control of the region. A successful uplink must be maintained in order to complete the transfer of control, so you need to keep the enemy off the point if you want to liberate the area.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Survey area bravo located. Deploy the Signal Scanner relay within the noted area.
Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 50%, and killing a target will double this bonus for the next 10 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
You must be in the warpgate to squad deploy.
Get kills to complete this directive.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Well we hunger for food, support Planetside 2 so we can eat please.

<font color="#00FFAA">Shroud Dispersal Network</font> - The plan is to create a network of buoys capable of suppressing the vortex that encapsulates the island, giving us free access to and from the archipelago. This is a pretty vast network, so it'll take some time to get everything in place.
The suppressor reduces the noise and muzzle flash generated by the firearm, and prevents the player from showing on the minimap when firing. Bullet velocity and effectiveness at range are reduced.
Aircraft: Destroy 50 vehicles in a light aircraft
Apply the single use Giraffe camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this decal. Thanks for being a loyal player!
Phalanx turrets at the facility gain infrared zoom optics and can fire for longer before overheating.
Show me what you're made of!
Citadel Shield cannot be deployed at this location.
Improves the top speed of the Reaver in both cruising and afterburner modes.
The video upload system received a bad response.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 50 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Sparkler Hood Ornament. NC use only.
Head to either Indar, Hossin or 艾美瑞什. The waypoint will guide you to where the cipher is and where to deliver it.
The Illumniated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rounds.
Customize your Colossus tank with a variety of weapons and cosmetics. Contains equivalent weapons and cosmetics for NC, TR, VS, and NSO.
Improves airborne speed and roll capabilities.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
Customize your Flash with this yellow antenna ball. TR use only.
Adds the Goliath style hubcaps to your Harasser. NC use only.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/[ft]say</font> - Sends a text message to your fireteam's channel.
Apply the Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
When activated, the Harasser is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields.
TR: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.8 seconds.
There was an error with the video uploading system.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Lightning by 10%.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
Get it? Gives bonus Space Pumpkin Seeds and increases experience gained by 50% for 7 days. Can only be used on this character.
Apply the Sandy Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Reduces the timer for acquiring MAX armor by 240 seconds.
Happy 6th Anniversary! Celebrate six years of PlanetSide with an explosion of faction color!
Apply the single use Esamir Snow camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "H" Hood Ornament.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
TR - Pistol - Mid - V9 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The Prowler M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. TR use only.
Apply the Forest Ground camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rockets.
Join Combat is disabled in this game mode.
The most powerful handgun on Auraxis, the Spear EMC8's high recoil and low RPM are offset by its unparalleled lethality.
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
The Proton FBW is an effective anti-tank guided plasma cannon. Once a lock-on is established seeking plasma can be fired and will seek the locked target.
NS35 Frag Cannon Right Auraxium Medal
Your outfit is currently disqualified from joining
Prevents lock-on weaponry from targeting allied aircraft within 140 meters of the Galaxy, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.
The TR brass thinks you're overdue for an upgrade to that standard issue armor! Act now for a deep discount on a variety of composite helmets and armors!

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Regenerates 30 health per second when out of combat for 12 seconds.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Magrider. VS use only.
Improves the ability of the Flash to dart in and out of combat and line up targets by improving traction, turning rate, brakes, and reverse speed.
Increases the top speed of the Scythe by 4 KPH.

Nanite Systems technicians have developed deployable refineries that can process the radioactive Elysium crystals that have recently begun forming near the geysers on Esamir. Foster believes this crystallized Elysium will accelerate the creation of powerful new supercell capacitors which will be integrated into the new containment facilities.
Adds the Gold Tubular Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
This massive bundle contains a variety of wintery weapons. All factions can use these items.
Adds the Gold Hyena X Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Lightweight snow-camo plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Failed to set the squad leader.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Ah. Your fellow operatives have sent word that there are two outposts in your area that may still have functioning consoles.
Apply the single use Indar Savanna camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies an Exit decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1050 rounds.
The control point is secure. Capture progress made by the enemy is now being removed.
Requires a completed Expedition: Polystellarite in the Armory.
Allows the user to permanently see the world in infrared vision.
Nanite Systems weapons bought with Daybreak Cash are useable by all characters on an account unless stated otherwise.
<font color="#00FFAA">Helmsman:</font> We have arrived at our destination. Engines at zero.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
We have sufficient resources and data, but we can use more and we want to stifle the progress of other empires.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, can resupply the ammunition of ground vehicles in its vicinity. TR only.
Increases the range of Nanite Burst.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1.125 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 58 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Final target has been compromised, mission complete. Representative Foster has requested your presence on Sanctuary.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Operative, are you there? I've just received some troubling news.
Adds a windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
A Vanu Sovereignty anti-personnel Proximity Mine that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.
This top-mounted mining laser allows a gunner to quickly harvest additional Cortium and siege enemy structures, but sacrifices defensive capabilities to do so.
Our enemies have just captured control point A, we need to retake the point before they capture the base!
You are not allowed inside the Vanu Sovereignty embassy.
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Adds 4 rockets to the default magazine size.
The Suits should cut you a bonus check. In fact, they may have. Come back to the Warpgate for a debrief.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "G" Gold Hood Ornament.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Nascent Expeditions is the best the galaxy has to offer at mining and transporting raw materials, meaning we only use the best gear and hire the best soldiers for our mining operations.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
We have refunded the Engineer's Proximity Mines to fix a medal tracking issue. You will need to repurchase this skill line.
Rampart Wall will not be available until the new placement system is complete
While in contested territory, absorb 5000 damage using the Seraph Shield.
Continue to support the war efforts once this task is complete. Contact will be made once analysis is complete.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "D" Hood Ornament.

Celebrate seven years of PlanetSide 2 with this special bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for VS/NC/TR/NSO empires. Heroic Boost is granted only to the character that purchases the bundle.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Capturing this node is the primary objective.
Purple Lumifiber Tiger Trim for the Valkyrie. VS use only.
Apply the Northern Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Nanite Systems' laser-assisted gunsight is perfect for situations that need a little more range than a standard reflex scope. The LANS uses a simple red dot reticule with 3.4x magnification.
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.
Large enemy constructs are vulnerable to explosive vehicle weaponry and C4, while smaller devices may be destroyed by small arms fire.
Single Use Desert Scrub v1 Camo
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Sunderer. TR use only.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. NC use only.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Creates a smoke screen around the vehicle that makes it difficult to see and prevents lock-ons for several seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Use Global Render Distance Setting. Use the global value if enabled or specific values for Infantry, Ground Vehicles and Air Vehicles if disabled.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> This technology should fast-forward our efforts toward containing the rampant energy on Esamir. I will contact you again when your services are needed.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Secondary weapon mount on the top of the Magrider. Operated by the passenger in seat 2.
The New Conglomerate has taken Mao!
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 915 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 113 rounds.
Next rank increase cloaked recharge rate and time cloak can remain active when stationary: Completely drained energy recharges in 16 seconds. Cloak can remain active while moving for 14 seconds.
Cert Points that are added to starting players on Test
The VSSC Gen II Pulsed Particle Accelerator is know for its high damage orbs and moderate splash damage.
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart.
This long-range optic magnifies zoom depth by six times, enabling easy acquisition of distant targets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Wait, wait. That's weird. No encryption, no firewalls, and it looks like... Uplink established? Gimme a second.
Most classes have access to the C-4 Present for 1 Cert. The other weapons are available in the Depot.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
Attack or defend control consoles as a Heavy Assault
Increases total Anti Vehicle Grenade capacity
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
A New Conglomerate anti-personnel Bouncing Betty that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.
Apply the Tiger Stripe camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.93% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The Fury launches 40mm grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. It is also capable of light damage against heavy armor. All factions can use this weapon.
The New Conglomerate's Mag-Cutter features a powerful electromagnet capable of cutting through enemy body armor.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Increases hold breath duration by 75%.
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Allows use of the long range 6x Trigon-6 scope.
Contains schematics for the Glaive IPC, Reinforcements Module, and the Orbital Strike Relay. Usable by all factions.

Vanu Labs' close-to-midrange Zenith VX-5 uses advanced crystalline structures to significantly reduce weight without compromising on strength. It features both precision hipfire and increased movement speed while aiming.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150 rounds.

Despite constant reminders that tampering with equipment is against corporate policy, overclocking the XMG-100's trigger system to enable higher refire rates became a common, if frowned upon practice for field operatives.
Anti-Personnel mines that explode in the presence of nearby enemy soldiers
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 175 rounds.
Earn this ribbon by blocking damage that leads to kills.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Applies a camo to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Allows the user to carry and place two additional bricks of C-4.
The Prowler is the Terran Republic's main battle tank. It is a fast tank with a dual cannon for maximum firepower.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Vanu Esamir Labs created the Equinox VE2 Burst to provide easily controllable burst fire for distant targets. VS use only.
Orders chat has been removed and certs have been refunded.
Blades are for cosmetic purposes only. Do not attempt to disembowel your opponents with your helmet. NC use only.
You can always tryout unlocks in the VR Training zone, accessed from a Warpgate Terminal, before unlocking.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Aircraft pulled from your Warpgate will have the correct sensory equipment integrated into it. Please fly an aircraft toward the designated location, high above the Shattered Warpgate.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> We still have old maps of the area, but they only tell part of the tale. Countless soldiers fell during the evacuation of Oshur, back before the rebirth matrix was online.
Dont lose the Galaxy before getting to the resupply area.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 500 rounds.
All messages must be delivered within the allotted time.

Nanite Systems researchers believe the Tempest energy stored in the derelict vehicles scattered across Esamir may be useful to the construction of the proposed Containment facilities. Reclaiming these derelict vehicles for further testing may lead to significant advancements in energy resistant alloys. Look for disabled vehicles at abandoned bases across the continent, or in the windswept tundra north of The Shattered Warpgate.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Galaxy Inertial Dampener - Level 5
A terminal control generator has been destroyed.
The New Conglomerate has defended Allatum!
Adds festive particle trails to the vehicle's wheels. All factions can use this gear.
Earn points by holding Allatum Botany Wing, Dahaka Southern Post, Zurvan Pump Station, Ti Alloys, Ceres Hydroponics, Crossroads Watchtower, or the Crown.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rockets.

No longer appeased by the stumbling technological advances of Nanite Systems, Field Officer Knightly of the Terran Republic makes a strategic maneuver to discover the truth. Conquer the continent of Esamir and uncover the truth buried benath the warpgate.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> The highlights for me were flipping the switch on the shiny new NS Containment Sites and going on to set up communications with the Desolation asteroid belt. I'd love to give you a day off, soldier, but you're still needed on the front lines. Those paychecks won't cash themselves.
MAX melee attacks now deal 50% more damage, and knock back enemies on impact.
Increases the yaw rate of the Liberator by 9 degrees/second.
Allows the Sunderer to resupply ammo to nearby vehicles.
Celebrate 5 years of PlanetSide 2 with this loyalty bundle.
Dolan can be found onboard Sanctuary back in the lower hallways.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 27%.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rockets.
Apply the Purple Giraffe camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
While cloaked the infiltrator can sprint faster, but will take 80% more damage
Good, you found one. Disperse the charge, reactivate the vehicle, and drive it back to our Warpgate.
Reduces camera shake and flinch from explosions and bullet impacts by 30%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

NSX weapon will be chosen from the following pool:

NSX Tomoe

NSX Naginata

NSX Daimyo

NSX Tengu

NSX Yumi

NSX Amaterasu

NSX Masamune
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> These pyres seem almost like a release valve, billowing into the sky. Is there too much energy beneath the surface?
This customization adds a Smiley Face decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.

Air Superiority Fighter
It can move at high speeds and do massive damage. Due to a lack of heavy armor they cannot take a lot of hits without becoming critically damaged. They are easily targeted by lock on rockets so flares may be a worthy first upgrade.
Adds yellow chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. NC use only.
Earn this ribbon from friendly players spawning at your Sunderer AMS.
Kill enemies using any ANT Top Gun.
Allows cortium to be used to create a garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer. TR use only.

Killing 3 enemies without being spotted will decrease the visibility of your Infiltrator cloak by 75%. Being spotted or getting killed will reset this benefit. Additionally, upon being spotted you will immediately scan the minimap for enemies within 20 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
NC: MAX: Flame 01: Left Copper Medal
Contains a NS-10 Burster plus 1000 Certs
Deploying an Advanced Nanite Transport (ANT) will allow access to a terminal which can be used to spawn constructs within the world.
Announce your coven's arrival with this cackling Witch horn. All factions can use this item.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Forest Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
Allows use of the long range 12x IO-12 sniper scope.
Wearable by Engineer. NC use only.

Single use consumable. Carry 4 on the field between resupplies. 40 max.
Deploys a Caltrop tank trap that inhibits the movement of vehicles. Lasts 30 minutes or until destroyed.
Yellow Lumifiber XW Trim for the Valkyrie. NC use only.
Prevent Esamir from being locked by gaining 50% territory control
Apply the Jungle Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
NS designers created this long range scope to meet the demanding requirements of Auraxis’ best long range snipers.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 9.5%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Heavy Assault: Kill 10 enemies when you're at less then 10 health
The KSR-35's high-powered 7x65 cartridge is extremely effective at dropping targets at medium range. TR use only.
Adds lightning trails to the Chimera's wheels. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trail changes based on your current faction.</font>
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by roughly 27%
Rankings update at the beginning of each round.
Our defense has failed, fall back!
Fire Ten Shots as an Engineer
Passively increases vehicle total Cortium Storage by 1750.
Increases magazine size by 2 rounds, but increases hipfire cone of fire by 20%.

Scrapped prior to release in favor of the Masamune's wire-guidance system and contextual firing modes, the NSX Muramasa can fire up to four accurate, high damage rockets either from the hip or while aiming down the optics.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 135 rounds.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Rashnu!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 grenades.
Welcome to Outfit Wars! The season will begin shortly:
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Liberator by 10%.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Reduces the timer for acquiring a MAX.
Reduces damage taken from flak by 4%.
Infuses the MAX with unstable energy for up to 25 seconds, increasing maximum damage output by 10% and movement speed slightly, but damage received is increased by 20%.
Squad: Headshot 5 Platoon leaders as a Platoon Leader

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> With the tech you... procured. We've come up with a way to re-enable the nano-machines that would typically disassemble these vehicles when they've become inoperable.
Increases the range and duration that soldiers can be resupplied by the ammunition pack
This facility now belongs to the VS!

Reload time when the weapon is empty

Aim at a location you want the orbital strike to hit. Must maintain fire for several seconds to establish a target.
Adds hubcaps to the Flash. All factions can use this gear.

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 16 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 10 seconds whether cloaked and stationary, or uncloaked.

The Terran Republic Embassy welcomes you. Field Officer Knightly has been looking forward to your arrival and will give you more information about your new role.

Prevents negative handling effects within an Electrical Storm, slows the rate at which Tempest accumulates on the vehicle, and reduces lightning bolt damage by 50%.
